channel.title: Networking on Dangerous.Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Dangerous.Tech

item.title: LinuxServer.IO Unifi Controller Deprecation
item.description: A little bit of help with upgrading away from the deprecated LSIO Unifi Controller Container

item.title: ZNC + Docker - A Containerized IRC Bouncer
item.description: Run an IRC bouncer to keep up with chats while you're AFK

item.title: Set Up Traefik on Docker - A Modern Reverse Proxy Solution
item.description: Configure Traefik to run in a docker container to provide reverse proxy services for the rest of your containers!

item.title: Docker Routing - Incorrect IP Address Detected by Traefik
item.description: Diagnosing some interesting Traefik routing issues!
